Dancing Trident

miscellaneous (lvl 4)

item id [id]: 300
weap id [weapon]: 121 (Dancing Trident)
damage [dmg]: 19
defence [def]: +1
length [len]: 5
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
 
(Intrinsic Weapon [bonus], Piercing Damage [pierce], Magic weapon [magic], Strength not added to damage [nostr])

Requires 5A to forge (A1)

This trident is enchanted with spells of flight. The trident constantly hovers around the owner and fights his enemies in battle.
